1.title: The Side-Car
1.plot: Molang and Piu Piu find the last piece of a puzzle which entitles one of their friends to win a magnificent sidecar. Now, they just have to find their pal and give it to him. But where is he hiding?

2.title: The Present
2.plot: Molang and Piu Piu have a birthday present for one of their friends. They want to send it to him, but the mailman has already come and gone. Now, they must conduct a high-speed chase to catch up with him, but where will this high-speed chase end up?

3.title: The Chickenpox
3.plot: Piu Piu has the chicken pox. The doctor orders Molang not to go near him, but he can't stand not seeing his best friend! Molang makes several attempts to visit his pal so that he can take care of him...

4.title: The Contest
4.plot: Today is the biggest watermelon contest! Piu Piu is sure to win because his watermelon is "huuuuuuuuge!" Unfortunately, it's also way too heavy to carry. Will he and Molang get there in time to enter the contest?

5.title: MC Molang
5.plot: When they find an old LP, Molang and Piu Piu become passionate about DJing, much to their neighbors' chagrin. They decide to go deep into the country to give a concert, but their music has a very strange effect on the chickens at the neighboring farm...

6.title: The Aquarium
6.plot: Molang and Piu Piu's sidecar gets a flat tire in the middle of a barren wasteland, empty but for an aquarium with no visitors. They decide to generate some publicity for the aquarium to attract tourists. One of their numerous publicity campaigns creates a lot of buzz for the aquarium!

7.title: The Highland Games
7.plot: During a trip to Scotland, Molang and Piu Piu stumble across a caber (tree trunk) tossing competition! They find themselves dragged into the Scottish games. They perform lamentably in all the games except for one-in which Piu Piu is unbeatable!

8.title: Ting Tong
8.plot: During a visit to the zoo, Molang and Piu Piu see a very melancholy gorilla. Piu Piu manages to cheer him up and restore his spirits. But after they leave, the big ape longs only for Piu Piu's return.

9.title: The Sled
9.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are having great fun on a luge-until they break it! To fix it, they borrow some tools from a friend who would rather play a video game about luges rather than ride one. Our two pals find a way to merge the real luge and the video game, so they can all play together.

10.title: The Piano
10.plot: After attending a piano concert, Molang and Piu Piu approach the instrument, hoping to play it, but instead, they accidentally break it! They find a replacement piano, but transporting it to the concert hall will be quite a challenge...

11.title: Safari
11.plot: Molang and Piu Piu's car breaks down...in the middle of the Savannah! But not to worry, they've got a mobile phone so they can call their friends for help. They just need to find a network signal!

12.title: The Jungle
12.plot: In the middle of the jungle, Molang and Piu Piu's car breaks down. They continue on foot, but Piu Piu is terrified: the jungle is full of wild beasts! Molang does his best to reassure him. But when it's time to cross a suspension bridge, it's Piu Piu's turn to reassure Molang!

13.title: The Rodeo
13.plot: Molang and Piu Piu attend a rodeo. Inspired, Piu Piu imagines himself riding a bronco and waving a lasso-but first he'll have to learn some cowboy skills. And that's no walk in the park!

14.title: At the Circus
14.plot: The circus is in town, and Molang and Piu Piu are in the front row! On his way to buy popcorn, Molang sneaks into a trailer and puts on a clown costume. The ringmaster sees him and sends him into the ring. Despite themselves, Piu Piu and Molang put on an astonishing show!

15.title: Cupcake
15.plot: Molang and Piu Piu discover an excellent cupcake restaurant. But the owner, their pal, is sad because he doesn't have any customers. Not to worry: they'll take care of him and handle all the publicity! Molang and Piu Piu end up doing their job well-perhaps a little too well!

16.title: The Food-Truck
16.plot: When Molang and Piu Piu enter a raffle, they win an old, broken-down truck. But they're not discouraged-they repair it and convert it into a food truck selling hot dogs. Their business is successful, drawing a large crowd...including a bunch of dogs, drawn to the mouth-watering smell!

17.title: Unlucky
17.plot: Molang and Piu Piu organize a costume party, but everything goes wrong. When it seems all is lost, they begin to clean the house...but the foam from a cleaning product inspires an excellent idea!

18.title: A Gust of Wind
18.plot: A strong wind buffets the beach. Molang and Piu Piu try to play volleyball with their pals, but the ball is uncontrollable. In fact, everything they try to do is affected by the wind, but this creates memorable moments, immortalized by a photographer.

19.title: The Climbing Rope
19.plot: Molang and Piu Piu hike in the mountains with a guide. When Molang begins yodeling, their hike turns catastrophic...

20.title: Holiday Home
20.plot: Molang and Piu Piu have rented a lovely vacation house deep in the forest. The brochure makes it look dreamy! But when they get there, the house doesn't look anything like the one in the brochure. Luckily, the forest animals are there to lend a hand!

21.title: The Fanfare
21.plot: Molang and Piu Piu want to be part of a brass band. Unfortunately, not a single instrument suits Piu Piu-until Molang finds another way to make music!

22.title: The Shooting Stars
22.plot: Piu Piu and Molang buy a telescope to look at shooting stars. Looking through it during the day, they see something that makes them rush to help one of their pals, who seems to be in dire straits...

23.title: The Ghost Train
23.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are on a ghost train (a dark ride at the amusement park), but they're so frightened that they destroy the ride as they try to flee. To redeem themselves, they offer to repair the ride. But in their hands, the ghost train is transformed into a palace of wonders...

24.title: The Golf
24.plot: Molang and Piu Piu stumble across a golf course. They long to drive the electric golf carts, but they're strictly reserved for the golfers! No worries: our two pals will just have to play golf!

25.title: The Salesman
25.plot: Whenever a door to door salesman knocks at the door with an item, Molang buys it! Soon, Molang and Piu Piu's house is full of useless objects. They try to sell these objects in the neighborhood, but they find no takers. Luckily, they come up with a great idea to get rid of them...

26.title: The Boomerang
26.plot: In Australia, Molang and Piu Piu try out a pal's boomerang. Inadvertently, they toss it into a mob of kangaroos...who aren't too keen to give it back!

27.title: At the Farm
27.plot: Molang and Piu Piu visit a farmer friend. They help him ready his cow for a competition at the fair. It turns out that Molang and Piu Piu's unusual ideas are quite useful when it comes to getting the cow primped for the competition...

28.title: Kung-Fu
28.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are at an open market making crepes, but they're not particularly skilled at the task. A mysterious pal offers to give them Kung Fu lessons at his place-lessons which will turn them into masters of crepe-making!

29.title: Rainy Day
29.plot: Molang and Piu Piu go on a fishing vacation. But when they reach their destination, the rain sets in. What a pity! Molang tries to fish anyway, leaning his cane awkwardly out the window. In the end, they realize that dancing under the rain isn't so bad.

30.title: The Acrobats
30.plot: When Molang and Piu Piu go to the circus, they long to be part of the show. But they're unable to convince the ringmaster to take them on...until Molang accidentally turns into a live cannonball!

31.title: The Jam Jar
31.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are making and canning jam. Unfortunately, the next morning, it's impossible to open any of the jam jars! Our two pals must use all their creative skills to find a solution...

32.title: The Parrot
32.plot: Piu Piu and Molang are delighted to baby-sit Coco, a friend's parrot, for the day. But the second they look away, Coco escapes! To lure her back, Piu Piu dons a small parrot disguise. But though inspired, this idea soon backfires on our two friends...

33.title: The Robinsons
33.plot: Molang and Piu Piu go on a cruise, but the ship sinks and washes up on a desert island. Far from being discouraged, our two friends become like the Swiss Family Robinson, turning the little island into an ingenious paradise! They may not want to leave anytime soon!

34.title: The Little Monkey
34.plot: Out on the savannah, Molang, Piu Piu, and a veterinarian tend to a small, injured monkey. They lavish attention on it, bathe it, play with it... They take such good care of it that once it's healed, it doesn't want to leave. How will they convince the little monkey to rejoin the other monkeys in the wild?

35.title: The Casting
35.plot: In Mollywood, Molang and Piu Piu are at a casting session, auditioning for a film. But when all their attempts end in mishaps, they decide to become advertising stars instead!

36.title: The Soccer Match
36.plot: Molang plays in a soccer game while Piu Piu cheers him from the stands. After a shot from the opposing team, the goalie falls and knocks himself out. Who will replace him? Piu Piu is the only one available, but he may be too scared to join in!

37.title: Ski School
37.plot: Molang and Piu Piu take skiing lessons. They're very clumsy-so much so that their instructor recommends that they stop trying to ski and go drink some hot chocolate instead. But when one of their skiing buddies needs help, Molang and Piu Piu must overcome their limitations and help.

38.title: The Incredible Animal
38.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are on safari. Piu Piu sees a rhinoceros. When he mentions it to their guide, he doesn't believe him: "A white rhinoceros? They don't exist." But Molang and Piu Piu set off in search of this incredible animal.

39.title: The Jungle Friend
39.plot: In the jungle, Molang and Piu Piu search for a rare flower. But the jungle is full of wild animals! When they find themselves facing a giant bat, they think all is lost! But a new pal appears, swinging from jungle vine to jungle vine to rescue them. It's the start of a beautiful friendship...

40.title: The Monster Under the Bed
40.plot: Molang and Piu Piu see a horror movie. When they get home, they panic: what if the monster in the movie is hiding in their house? Piu Piu is too worried to sleep, so Molang has to find a way to reassure him.

41.title: Alone on the Ice Pack
41.plot: On an ice pack, Molang and Piu Piu make friends with a lonely astronomer. He's so happy to see them, but very sad when they leave. Luckily, our two pals come up with a great idea to turn his observatory into an enticing tourist attraction!

42.title: The Vegetable Garden
42.plot: Molang and Piu Piu want to plant a vegetable garden. They sow the earth and plant the seeds...which all the birds immediately eat. How will they keep the birds away?

43.title: A Bottle at Sea
43.plot: When Molang and Piu Piu find a bottle with a map inside, they realize it's a treasure map. They set sail for adventure, but all they end up finding is garbage. They immediately decide to do all they can to clean the ocean.

44.title: The Egg
44.plot: In the jungle, Molang and Piu Piu witness the hatching of a parrot egg! Nearby, an egg falls into the river and is carried off by the current. Molang and Piu Piu jump into their canoe to rescue the egg, but at the same time, a determined crocodile swims after them...

45.title: The Mouse
45.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are making cheese fondue in a mountain chalet as a little mouse watches avidly. At night, the mouse wreaks havoc on the chalet, searching for the cheese. Not knowing where the sounds are coming from, Molang and Piu Piu prepare to confront an imagined intruder.

46.title: The Rallye
46.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are fishing peacefully in an inflatable dinghy. Suddenly, they hear the starting signal for an automobile race on the shore. Molang casts his fishing rod, but it catches on one of the cars, causing an accident that sidelines the poor race car driver. But Molang and Piu Piu come up with a brilliant idea for fixing his car!

47.title: The Supporters
47.plot: On a walk, Piu Piu gets a cold and can't stop sneezing. Our two pals go home, catching a bus full of basketball fans. They decide to go to the game with them. Unfortunately, their team can't make a single basket! What if Piu Piu's sneezes suddenly became useful?

48.title: Little Peckish
48.plot: Molang and Piu Piu help an archaeologist friend on a dig. During the lunch break, a groundhog steals Piu Piu's lunch-and he chases after it! In their attempts to recover the stolen sandwich, Piu Piu and Molang discover a remarkable cave...

49.title: Mister Muscles
49.plot: At the circus, Molang and Piu Piu see the amazing Mr. Muscles' show. But when Mr. Muscles sees a small mouse, he flees in fright. Molang and Piu Piu come up with a plan to help him.

50.title: The Brioche
50.plot: Piu Piu enters Molang's name in a TV cooking show contest. Molang wins and becomes a star! But his newfound celebrity makes it impossible to see Piu Piu. How will the pals put up with not seeing each other?

51.title: The Ibex
51.plot: While picnicking in the mountains, Molang and Piu Piu inadvertently drop the keys to their chalet, which land on a mountain sheep's horns! They'll have to use all their ingenuity to get the keys back...and they'll help a shepherd friend in the process.

52.title: Flash Mob
52.plot: Piu Piu is suspicious: he thinks Molang is hiding something from him. He decides to follow his friend to the train station...where an incredible surprise awaits him!

1.title: The Party
1.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are invited to a party. They dress themselves up, but Piu Piu's kiss curl might prevent them from going out. Fortunately, Molang has an idea.

2.title: The Bicycle Ride
2.plot: Molang's and Piu Piu's friends suggest they go on a bicycle ride, but Piu Piu can't keep up with them. Molang is going to do everything he can to make sure his friend also enjoy the ride.

3.title: The Castaways
3.plot: Molang and Piu Piu find themselves in a lifeboat in the middle of the ocean. There is no sight of land. Piu Piu starts to panic, but Molang stays confident...until he realizes there is no paddle left. How can they go back to dry land?

4.title: The Camel
4.plot: Having barely arrived in the desert, Molang, Piu Piu and their friends decide to go on a camel ride. To do that, they will have to mount them...

5.title: The Coconut
5.plot: Molang, Piu Piu and their friends are relaxing on deckchairs under the shade of a palm tree when a coconut falls at their feet. Great! They just have to open it to feast on it. But it's not that easy to open a coconut!

6.title: The Suitcase
6.plot: Molang, Piu Piu and their friends are going on holiday in the sun. They have to pack their bags. But it's not an easy task for Molang as he wants to take all his belongings.

7.title: The Christmas Tree
7.plot: It's Christmas Day. Piu Piu is about to decorate their small tree. But, after a snowball fight with his friends, a chilled to the bone Molang relights the fire... and accidentally throws in the little tree. No problem! Our friends will go on looking for another tree.

8.title: The Goldfish
8.plot: Molang's and Piu Piu's goldfish looks completely depressed in its bowl. Immediately, they go in search of a friend for their goldfish. But the seabed is full of surprises.

9.title: The Beach
9.plot: With their swimming caps on, our two friends load their camper-van with their surfboards and a parasol: they're ready to go surfing! It doesn't matter if the beach is crowded; Molang and Piu Piu do some freestyle surf figures. But this joyful seaside moment worsens when Molang loses his cap in the water.

10.title: The Fishing Trip
10.plot: Molang and Piu Piu decide to spend the day fishing by the lake. But the peaceful fishing trip doesn't go exactly as planned.

11.title: The Campers
11.plot: Molang and Piu Piu meet their friends to go camping. Molang is very proud to use his state-of-the-art tent. But every time he tries to set it up, something goes wrong: he annoys a wasp, disturbs a hedgehog family... Fortunately, Molang finds a way to enjoy the night under the stars with his friends.

12.title: The Television
12.plot: Molang and Piu Piu invite all their friends to watch the soccer game on their brand new television. But first, they have to set up the TV. And things get complicated. Will Molang and Piu Piu be able to make the TV work in time for the arrival of their friends and the game's kick-off?

13.title: The Sleepless Night
13.plot: It's time to go to bed. Exhausted; Piu Piu rushes to his bed. But when Molang goes to bed, he makes too much noise and wakes his friend up. Molang is going to do everything he can to help his friend fall asleep, even if it means waking everyone up...

14.title: The Second-hand Market
14.plot: There is a second-hand market in the street. Molang sees it as the perfect occasion to bargain-hunt. Piu Piu disagrees: it's a chance to make some space, because the house is full to bursting point of trinkets. Molang and Piu Piu take the decision to run a stand at the second-hand market.

15.title: The Parcel
15.plot: Molang's garden is completely covered in snow. The mailman drops a parcel in the mailbox. Thrilled, Molang and Piu Piu put on warm clothes to retrieve the parcel, but then struggle as they head towards the mailbox. When they finally get there, what a surprise! The parcel is for the neighbor!

16.title: The Butterfly
16.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are in the countryside. Molang and Piu Piu see a beautiful butterfly. A great hunt is launched, but soon, the hunters become the prey.

17.title: The Surprise
17.plot: The mailman has delivered a huge parcel. Intrigued, Molang wants to open it, but Piu Piu says no. It's a surprise! Molang has to be patient and wait for their friends. Consumed with curiosity, Molang uses cunning tricks to find out what is inside the parcel before his friends arrive.

18.title: The Forest
18.plot: Molang and Piu Piu go into the forest with their friends to collect mushrooms. But they all part and Molang and Piu Piu get lost. Fortunately, friends are always there when you need them.

19.title: The Pumpkin
19.plot: It's Halloween today. Molang is dressed up as a mummy. Piu Piu has spent a lot of time carving a huge pumpkin to decorate the garden. There's no time to lose. As someone knocks at the door, Piu Piu gives the pumpkin to his mummy-disguised friend and runs to dress up... and finds himself face to face with Molang. But who has the precious pumpkin? And how can they get it back?

20.title: The Armchair
20.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are about to watch a DVD. They put the disc in the DVD player and sit comfortably. But the armchair is too small and eventually breaks. No worry! It's a good opportunity to buy a nice armchair at the second-hand market. Not only is it difficult to choose one, but they also have to bring it back home... on a skateboard! The journey back home turns into a mad dash.

21.title: Stage Fright
21.plot: As Molang is listening to Piu Piu's singing without him knowing, he realises that his friend has a beautiful voice. He decides to organise a recital and invites all their friends to come and listen to Piu Piu. But Piu Piu is very shy and when it's time to sing, no sound comes out of his beak! Molang then tries to find a way to make Piu Piu feel comfortable.

22.title: The Cowboys
22.plot: Molang and Piu Piu meet their friends at a ranch. Molang and Piu Piu go to get dressed, but Molang's incredible outfit shines so much that its sparkling scares all the cows. As their friends run everywhere throughout the field to round up the cattle, Molang and Piu Piu try to tame a horse, that didn't escape, to go and help their friends out.

23.title: The Bandanna
23.plot: Molang and Piu Piu meet with their friend to go on a bike trip. At this occasion, Molang gives Piu Piu a beautiful bandanna. But as soon as they take to the road, Piu Piu's bandanna flies away. Molang and Piu Piu then start to chase it. At the whim of the wind, the bandanna leads them to the Grand Canyon.

24.title: The Penguin
24.plot: Molang and Piu Piu go to the Antarctic to take some pictures of penguins. They want to get as close as possible. So close, that a Penguin mummy adopts Piu Piu and Molang struggles to get his friend back.

25.title: The Car
25.plot: Molang and Piu Piu have a new car, a magnificent yellow convertible. It's the perfect opportunity to meet with their friends for a picnic in the countryside. On the way, they realise their picnic has been blown away by the wind! They stop to buy a new food supply but when Piu Piu comes out of the grocery, the car has gone, and so has Molang! What has happened?

26.title: The Hiccup
26.plot: Molang, Piu Piu and their friends organise a dancing show. But suddenly, Piu Piu catches bad hiccups which puts the show in danger. Molang and his friends do everything they can to make them go away.

27.title: The Mountain Bloom
27.plot: To complete his herbarium, Piu Piu would like to go to the mountain to look for a very rare flower. Enthusiastic at first, Molang proposes they leave at once, but he soon loses his will. It's a steep mountain... Once they reach the shelter, Molang regains his strength and sings all night long. In the morning, Piu Piu tries to wake him up... in vain... Piu Piu sets off alone.

28.title: A Restless Night
28.plot: Along with their friends, Molang and Piu Piu organise a monster movie night. Once their friends are gone, Molang and Piu Piu go to bed, but they soon hear strange noises coming from the living room. Brrrr... What can it be? Monsters?

29.title: The Archaeologists
29.plot: Molang and Piu Piu go to an excavation site in the desert. Nothing goes as planned for the two amateur archaeologists, but their clumsiness allows the discovery of a mammoth's skeleton.

30.title: The Hockey Game
30.plot: Molang, Piu Piu and their friends improvise a hockey game on a frozen lake. Everything goes well until the ice cracks and breaks.They become stranded on an ice floe in the middle of the freezing lake. Molang and Piu Piu do everything they can to save their friends and bring them back safe and sound to dry land.

31.title: The Castle
31.plot: As Molang, Piu Piu and their friends go camping, they're caught in a storm. They take refuge in an old and abandoned castle. As Molang and Piu Piu have fun scaring each other, their friends are impressed by the spooky atmosphere of the place. Quickly, Molang and Piu Piu find a secret passage and decide to explore it.

32.title: The Shepherds
32.plot: Molang and Piu Piu visit a sheep pen and and are keen to help the shepherd. Needless to say, they quickly create a series of disasters. Fortunately, Molang and Piu Piu come up with a good idea to make it up to the shepherd.

33.title: The Puppy
33.plot: Molang and Piu Piu run across a lost puppy. Immediately, the pet bonds with them to such a extent that it follows them on their way back home and doesn't want to leave! Molang and Piu Piu do everything they can to find the owner of this friendly but rather annoying little pet.

34.title: The Underground Walk
34.plot: Along with their friends, Molang and Piu Piu go exploring in an underground cave. Acting in an undisciplined fashion, they disrupt the tour continually, much to their guide's displeasure. On top of that, Molang and Piu Piu part with the group and get lost in the various tunnels. How are they going to find their friends and get out of there?

35.title: The Hotel
35.plot: For one night, Molang and Piu Piu replace one of their friends and take on the role of maîtres d'hôtel. They handle the situation perfectly... until the first customers check-in.

36.title: The Explorers
36.plot: While at a second-hand market, Molang and Piu Piu find a treasure map. They set up an exploration group with their friends and go on an adventure through the jungle to find the treasure. Very soon, they realise that the jungle is full of surprises.

37.title: The Football Player
37.plot: Piu Piu wants, at any cost, to take a picture of his favorite football player. But by the time Molang and Piu Piu get to the stadium, the ticket office is closed. They decide to wait until the end of the game to see the football player. But this athlete and extreme sports enthusiast is not easy to keep up with...

38.title: The Robot
38.plot: Molang and Piu Piu buy a domestic robot that can replicate everything he sees. Thanks to him, all the chores are done in no time and the house is shining. It's the perfect occasion to throw a party for all their friends. The robot takes care of everything, but when he sees the guests eating, he imitates them and starts to lose control of himself. Eventually, Molang and Piu Piu are the ones who take care of the little robot.

39.title: A Friendly Rugby Game
39.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are playing rugby with their friends. The two of them are in opposite teams, but they can't stop from helping out each other, having fun and laughing, much to their friends' despair as they wanted to play a serious game.

40.title: The Firemen
40.plot: Molang and Piu Piu are invited to a costume party. They both dress up as firemen... far from imagining that they would be mistaken for real ones and become involved in the pursuit of a giraffe that has escaped from the circus.

41.title: The Keys
41.plot: At last, Molang and Piu Piu arrive at the beach where they set out all their things. Their friends, who arrived earlier, suggest they play badminton. Oh no! They left the rackets in the camper-van! They have to walk all the way back to get them. But Molang and Piu Piu realise they have a much more serious problem: where are the camper van keys?

42.title: The Lighthouse
42.plot: As the roadworks on their street seem never to end, Molang and Piu Piu can't stand the constant pneumatic drill noise any longer. They decide to leave for a much quieter place. What about spending the night in a lighthouse? Once they have arrived, everything looks perfect. But, they've missed an important detail...

43.title: The Stork
43.plot: A stork has decided to nest on Molang's and Piu Piu's rooftop. It tries to build its nest, but it's not an easy task! Molang and Piu Piu are going to do everything they can to help this awkward neighbor.

44.title: The Statue
44.plot: Piu Piu has sculpted a statue. When Piu Piu is out, a clumsy Molang breaks an arm off the statue. Molang calls his friends to help him mend it. While the friends work on the statue, Molang has to distract Piu Piu so that he doesn't notice what's happening.

45.title: The Movie
45.plot: As Molang and Piu Piu visit some film studios, they are mistaken for extras and swept away onto a movie set. But being extras is not really their forte and they keep on causing disasters.

46.title: The Rescuers
46.plot: For the whole of an afternoon, Molang and Piu Piu have to replace a beach lifeguard. This is not an easy task, but they handle the situation and get through this task.

47.title: Traffic Jam
47.plot: As Molang and Piu Piu go to the beach to meet their friends, they get stuck in an everlasting traffic jam... Molang decides to improvise a picnic and then play a beach volley game on the roofs of the cars. They have a great time with the other car drivers, and their friends, who were looking for them, quickly join the party.

48.title: The Baby Seal
48.plot: Molang and Piu Piu come across a lonely baby seal on the ice field and decide to take care of it. As they fish to feed the baby, they see something approaching. Thinking it's a killer whale, they run away with the baby seal to protect it. But in fact, it is the seal's mummy and it wants her baby back.

49.title: The Guest
49.plot: An old friend comes to spend the night at Molang and Piu Piu's. But this is a very clumsy friend who keeps on causing disasters. Molang and Piu Piu despair as they see their house completely upside down. But they eventually realise that their friend has a very special gift...

50.title: An Extraordinary Catch
50.plot: Molang and Piu Piu take up the challenge of fishing for a giant fish. Once at sea, it's not a fish that they find, but a dolphin caught in a net. Molang and Piu Piu rush towards it to free it and then discover the joy of swimming by its side.

51.title: Skiing
51.plot: Molang and Piu Piu go on winter holidays with their friends. They decide to have a hot chocolate at the top of the mountain. Molang and Piu Piu are delighted at this idea, but they soon change their minds when they get on the button lift. Staying on the ski lift is much more difficult than they thought.

52.title: Superstars
52.plot: An eccentric man notices Molang's and Piu Piu's talent for dancing and promises them the earth. Molang and Piu Piu meet with great success and become real stars. But soon, Molang and Piu Piu miss their quiet little life with their friends. This is why they are going to do everything they can to get back a normal life.

imdb.plot outline: Molang is an affectionate and humorous perspective on the relationship between an eccentric, joyful and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet and emotional little chick. Despite their many differences, these two enjoy a unique friendship. They have great times together ranging from the mundane to the extraordinary. Whether they're flying to the moon or merely watering the vegetable patch, Molang and Piu Piu experience unexpected, even unsettling situations. Tricky incidents and misunderstandings are soon transformed into opportunities for fun moments and humor, which Molang's friends are happy to come and share in.
imdb.title: Molang
plot: _Molang_ (qv) and Piu Piu are invited to a party. They dress themselves up, but Piu Piu's kiss curl might prevent them from going out. Fortunately, _Molang_ (qv) has an idea.

_Molang_ (qv) is an affectionate and humorous perspective on the relationship between an eccentric, joyful and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet and emotional little chick. Despite their many differences, these two enjoy a unique friendship. They have great times together ranging from the mundane to the extraordinary. Whether they're flying to the moon or merely watering the vegetable patch, _Molang_ (qv) and Piu Piu experience unexpected, even unsettling situations. Tricky incidents and misunderstandings are soon transformed into opportunities for fun moments and humor, which _Molang_ (qv)'s friends are happy to come and share in.
